page.title: 18Food
page.content: Food is one of the main things in life. In our village of Fordham we can buy most of the food we need. We have a{General Stores}which sells fresh bread and vegetables. They also sell all the other necessities, like tinned food and frozen food.Another shop in the village is the{butchers}which sells lots of different kinds of meat. Every Wednesday and Saturday a {Greengrocer's}van visits the village. He sells all different kinds of fruit and vegetables.If we need eggs,there is a farm just up the hill.Also in Fordham there is an{egg farm}where the workers sell eggs. Regularly every Thursday a fish and chip van comes to the village. In the village there are some allotments.These are useful to people for growing extra vegetables, especially if their garden is small.
